com.percussion.extensions.translations
Class PSFormEncodeDecodeHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extensions.translations.PSFormEncodeDecodeHelper

public class PSFormEncodeDecodeHelper
extends Object

Helper class to handle the encoding and decoding of HTML form tag elements to and from a div tag marker used to represent the form tag. This is needed as a workaround for EditLive single instance when form tags need to be present in the content. Will also encode and decode embed tags as well.

Author:
erikserating

          Looks for div tags with a special rxFormTagMarker attribute that indicates the div tag is being used as a form tag placeholder and turns them back into form tags.

Method Detail

encode

public static String encode(String content)
Looks for form tags and turns them into div tags with a special rxFormTagMarker attribute that indicates the div tag is being used as a form tag placeholder.

Parameters:
content - the html content string, cannot be null.
Returns:
the encoded content string, never null.

decode

public static String decode(String content)
Looks for div tags with a special rxFormTagMarker attribute that indicates the div tag is being used as a form tag placeholder and turns them back into form tags.

Parameters:
content - the html content string, cannot be null.
Returns:
the encoded content string, never null.

main

public static void main(String[] args)
